name: Face ID Patient Tracking
description: A system leveraging deep learning for face detection and recognition to track patient activities within a clinic, monitor entry and exit using video streams, and manage timing for therapy sessions.
role: Led research and development to build robust face detection and recognition systems using ArcFace and FaceNet512 for recognition and SSD for face detection in live video streams
Assisted the development team in designing the application architecture for patient registration and edge-based detection/recognition integrated with the existing EHR system
Oversaw the development of a FastAPI-based monolithic server handling endpoints for face recognition
